sub_title: Visual Designer at Straight Pre Media
summary: I am a highly creative and versatile Senior Visual Designer with over 7 years of experience in graphic design, with a solid background in fine art, advertising, and motion design, I bring a unique blend of creativity and technical expertise to the table. My skills revolve around branding and art direction, creating visually striking designs, illustrations, and animations that tell compelling stories and engage audiences
